questions.question: What language is used to structure web pages?
questions.explanation: HTML structures web page content and elements.

questions.question: What tag creates a paragraph?
questions.explanation: The p tag defines paragraphs in HTML.

questions.question: What tag creates a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The a tag creates clickable links.

questions.question: What attribute specifies the URL of a link?
questions.explanation: The href attribute defines the link destination.

questions.question: What tag displays images?
questions.explanation: The img tag embeds images in HTML.

questions.question: What tag creates the largest heading?
questions.explanation: h1 is the largest heading tag.

questions.question: What tag creates an unordered list?
What tag creates a line break?
questions.explanation: br inserts line breaks without new paragraphs.

questions.question: What element contains page metadata?
questions.explanation: head contains title, links, and other metadata.

questions.question: What tag makes text bold?
questions.explanation: b or strong tags make text bold.
